body:
Since `root +http` was [disabled](https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/ae3eac0b1946ce76b578c9c40d994a601a223761), we [now have](https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/c85dc3a5b431409bed5b0753f04049641f4d3761) a FastCGI package `fcgi` which allows `root +http` to work again. In EIC we depend on `root +http` for a dd4hep geometry web display tool.

Tests: successfully built with +http:
```

```
